content.title: Ancient Tower Golems
content.body:
During the time of the Ancient War, the Necromancers constructed great machines to fight for them.
They referred to these constructs as "Tower Golems", and placed them all over their great defensive towers.
These golems were well-built, hard to slay, and hard to survive a hit from. They slaughtered thousands of our ancestorsâ€™ protective mages.
These towers remain standing in their prime to this day, their guardians waiting for someone to challenge them.
